column4: Hello, I'm having a problem with the game StepMania. It closes out each time I exit or hit the tab button. Anyone know what might be causing this and how to fix it?
Does anyone know how to fix this?
I'm having a problem with the game StepMania. It logs off my user each time I exit or hit the tab button exsessivly.
It's really quite annoying as I'm trying to download stuff =P
What it's doing is crashing your X, which automatically restarts.
(its crashing, and taking X out with it)
It's crashing even though I told it to quit?
I suppose?  It might not be crashing, but X isn't liking whatever its doing.  Check launchpad for a bug report, if there isn't one, file one.
Probably, but I don't know what.
How exactly do I check launchpad? =P
